title: La Toscane au Moyen Age
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on textured off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
description: Vertical sheet depicting a street looking toward the buildings of a medieval town.  The road is flanked by very lightly sketched three-story buildings with only the shadows colored with wash.  At the end of the street are turreted masonry buildings and a green hill with trees behind them. These buildings and the sky above have been colored.
name: Album page
